Significant heterogeneity was observed for pooled analysis of prevalence rate in overall included studies and subgroup studies ( p < 0.001). The heterogeneity was considered very high with I
2 > 95% in all pooled analyses and did not change considerably in different subgroups. Sensitivity analysis showed that the pooled rate was quite stable when excluding any of the studies. Funnel plot and Egger’s test indicated the existence of publication bias (Additional file 4: Figure S4, p = 0.003).
